timeline.author: fgalan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -8,3 +8,4 @@ Fix: Changing cygnus port does not work (#1698)
 [cygnus-ngsi] Changed log level for some events (#1769)
 [cygnus-ngsi][PostgisSink, PostGRESQLSink] Support for native Postgres and Postgis types (#1780)
 [cygnus-ngsi][MySQL] Support for native MySQL types (#1780)
+[cygnus-ngsi] Add correlatorId rollbacked transactions (#1770)

replies.bodyText:
Not really sure about that @fgalan. All correlatorIds (inside the batch) are stored on a String divided by ",", so since I split that String every entry is supposed to have a different one.
Do you agree?
replies.author: IvanHdzC

replies.bodyText: Complex to be explained/understood by comments :). Let's talk F2F or by skype.
replies.author: fgalan

timeline.message: add last corelatorID from accumulator to log object
add last corelatorID from accumulator to log object
